rows.label: qst005602_msg001
rows.name: Excuse me! I have a question!

rows.label: qst005602_msg002
rows.name: Yes, yes, why the loud voice, mo?

rows.label: qst005602_msg003
rows.name:
I heard that Rogirogi-san
has an ancient text about
an ancient stone tablet...

rows.label: qst005602_msg004
rows.name:
I'd like to see that
ancient text for a bit.

rows.label: qst005602_msg005
rows.name:
I have tons of ancient
texts like that, mo...

rows.label: qst005602_msg006
rows.name:
Tell me more about the ancient
tablet you're researching, mo.

rows.label: qst005602_msg007
rows.name:
The tablet is transparent, thin,
and it floats in the air.

rows.label: qst005602_msg008
rows.name:
...Are you sure that's
a stone tablet, mo?

rows.label: qst005602_msg009
rows.name:
Of course! It's definitely a tablet
containing ancient information!

rows.label: qst005602_msg010
rows.name:
Thin and floating in
the air, mo? ...Ah!

rows.label: qst005602_msg011
rows.name:
I certainly have an ancient text
with a picture like that, mo!

rows.label: qst005602_msg012
rows.name: That's it! I want to see that one.

rows.label: qst005602_msg014
rows.name: You want me to pay to see it?

rows.label: qst005602_msg015
rows.name:
That ancient text was hard to get,
mo. It's a very valuable item, mo!

rows.label: qst005602_msg016
rows.name:
If you don't like it,
you can leave, mo...

rows.label: qst005602_msg017
rows.name:
Well, I guess it's wrong of us
to expect to see a valuable
book for free. Rex, please!

rows.label: qst005602_msg018
rows.name: Whaaat?!

rows.label: qst005602_msg019
rows.name: Did you bring the money this time, mo?

rows.label: qst005602_msg020
rows.name: Pay 10000G?

rows.label: qst005602_msg021
rows.name:
Thank you for your business, mo!
Here's the ancient text, mo! Take
your time looking at it, mo.

rows.label: qst005602_msg022
rows.name:
Hmm, hmm. It certainly has a
picture of that tablet...

rows.label: qst005602_msg023
rows.name:
But it's full of unreadable
characters. I can't make
sense of it at all.

rows.label: qst005602_msg024
rows.name: It's okay, leave it to me!

rows.label: qst005602_msg025
rows.name: What did it say?

rows.label: qst005602_msg026
rows.name:
...It seems to be an
explanation of that tablet.

rows.label: qst005602_msg027
rows.name:
The characters are faded and hard
to read in many places, but...

rows.label: qst005602_msg028
rows.name:
I was able to figure out that part
of the tablet's name is XE36.

rows.label: qst005602_msg029
rows.name:
The tablet has a name?
That's strange...

rows.label: qst005602_msg030
rows.name: Oh! Shiki, that's not a name!

rows.label: qst005602_msg031
rows.name: Oh!!

rows.label: qst005602_msg032
rows.name:
XE36 must be part of
the twelve-digit code!

rows.label: qst005602_msg033
rows.name: You did it, Shiki!

rows.label: qst005602_msg034
rows.name:
I don't have that kind
of money right now...

rows.label: qst005602_msg035
rows.name: Whaaat?!

rows.label: qst005602_msg036
rows.name: Wait a moment! I'll get the money!

rows.label: qst005602_msg037
rows.name: Rex will!

rows.label: qst005602_msg038
rows.name: Whaaat?!

rows.label: qst005602_msg039
rows.name: Pay

rows.label: qst005602_msg040
rows.name: Don't pay
